TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProcessingMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Used to specify the processing mode of the ReportViewer control.
Docs.remarks:
<!CDATA[
## Remarks This enumerator is used to set the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.ProcessingMode%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer> control.
]>

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ProcessingMode Local = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the report will be processed and rendered using the reporting engine provided by the ReportViewer control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ProcessingMode Remote = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies remote processing mode against a Reporting Services report server.
